resources.string:
To use with an emulator:

 adb -e forward tcp:%port tcp:%port

then use any WebDAV client, connect it to localhost:%port.
Stop port forwarding:

 adb -e forward --remove-all
You may withdraw manage all files permission now.
This app needs access to the storage on this device. Please allow access to external storage.
You have previously declined this permission.\nYou must approve it in the \"Permissions\" of the app settings on your device.
